decision_conditions: T8 = 1 X Scots Pine to cut back to Boundary. Not covered by TPO
T9 = 1 X Eucalyptus Tree to Reduce by 3.5/5.0Mtrs. Not covered by TPO
T8 and T9 are not covered by a TPO.
T1-T6 = 6 X Lime Trees to Reduce to Old Pruning Points (2.00/2.5Mtrs) Group G3 on TPO 4/74
T7 = 1 X Monterey Cypress Tree to Fell to Ground Level, Group G3 on TPO 4/74
T10 = 2 X Sycamore Trees to Reduce by 2.0/2.5Mtrs. Group G1 on TPO 8/77
T11 = 2 X Sycamore Trees to Reduce by 2.0/2.5Mtrs.T4 on TPO 4/74.
The work for which consent is granted shall be carried out to the standards detailed in British Standard Document BS 3998:2010.
Reason:
To ensure that the work is carried out in accordance with good arboricultural practice.
The work for which consent is granted shall be carried out as an overall reduction, so that the tree's crown remains balanced.
Reason:
To ensure that the tree's stability is maintained and in the interests of public amenity.
The work for which consent is granted shall be carried out within 2 years from the date of this consent.
Reason:
To prevent the accumulation of consents.
That the tree for which consent for removal is granted shall be replaced by one of the following,
Monterey Cypress.
Swamp Cypress
Lawson Cypress
Yew.

This should be a, heavy-standard, container grown, 12-14 cm girth, with in the same location of the existing Monterey Cypress on the left hand side of the entrance to replace the felled tree and to be completed within the first available planting season (November to March)
Failure to plant the replacement tree(s) as required can lead to enforcement action.
THE APPLICANT SHALL NOTIFY THE LOCAL PLANNING AUTHORITY IN WRITING WITHIN TWO MONTHS OF THE PLANTING BEING CARRIED OUT, SO THAT THE REPLACEMENT TREE CAN BE INSPECTED.
Reason:
In the interests of public amenity and to enable the Council to update its records.
description:
T1-T6 = 6 X Lime Trees to Reduce to Old Pruning Points (2.0/2.5Mtrs)
T7 = 1 X Monterey Cypress Tree to Fell to Ground Level
T8 = 1 X Scots Pine to cut back to Boundary
T9 = 1 X Eucalyptus Tree to Reduce by 3.5/5.0Mtrs
T10 + T11 = 2 X Sycamore Trees to Reduce by 2.0/2.5Mtrs
